name: 蒼葉
message: "Haa... Haa, haa..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny!"
I unlock the door and burst into the house. It's pitch black, like no one's home.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny?"
I call for her one more time, but no answer.
...This is bad.
It feels like my blood's about to boil. At the same, my body is wracked by chills.

The bloodstains on the wall of Dry Juice's hangout.
The old woman in the game, kidnapped by bats.
My mind keeps flicking between the two images.
Did they get to Granny too?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny!"
I run into the house, not even bothering to take off my shoes.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?! Woah!"
Something catches my foot. I look down.
...Huh?
What's that big lump doing... there...
A person is lying in the hall.
...Granny?
The person is lying face down, motionless. Another one is lying on the floor a little farther inside.
I swallow my fear and tiptoe closer.
They're both much bigger than Granny. Probably men.
Relief washes over me.
But if they're not Granny... then who are they?
Looking closer, I notice a tattoo on their necks.
...It looks like a gang tag.
Actually...
This tag...

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Morphine."
Feeling someone behind me, I spin around.
A man is standing there, framed by the dark hallway.
The man is so tall that I have to look up at him. For a moment, I just stand there and gape.
But the thought that he might have done something to Granny soon blows away any fear I'm feeling.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Where's Granny?"

The man doesn't answer. He just stares at me through the darkness with icy eyes.
I take a step closer.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I said, where is sh―ngh?!"
Someone grabs my shoulders from behind. Suddenly, I'm surrounded by people, holding me in place.

name: 蒼葉
message: "L-Let go! Let the fuck go―ngh?!<?>
A heavy blow slams into my stomach, knocking the breath from my lungs.
The huge man's fist sinks into my gut.
I topple forward. I can't breathe. My vision fades into darkness.

Damn it...<K>
Not here...
Granny...
...Granny...
